0.text: Innate - The Ball: Orianna is accompanied by The Ball, which she commands with her abilities. The Ball incurs a  0.15-second global cooldown on all abilities between casts. Additionally, The Ball attaches to Orianna if she is near it, and snaps back to her if she moves too far away from it, which incurs a  0.5-second global cooldown on all abilities.
0.html: Innate - The Ball: Orianna is accompanied by The Ball, which she commands with her abilities. The Ball incurs a  0.15-second global cooldown on all abilities between casts. Additionally, The Ball attaches to Orianna if she is near it, and snaps back to her if she moves too far away from it, which incurs a  0.5-second global cooldown on all abilities.
markedPassages: 0.15-second
0.5-second

1.text:
Innate: Orianna's basic attacks generate a stack of Clockwork Winding for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent attacks and stacking up to 2 times. All stacks are lost when attacking a new enemy.
Clockwork Winding: Orianna's basic attacks are empowered to deal 10 − 50 (based on level) (+ 15% AP) bonus magic damage  on-hit, increased by「 20% 」「 2 − 10 (based on level) (+ 3% AP) 」per stack, up to 14 − 70 (based on level) (+ 21% AP) total bonus magic damage.

1.text: The pulse leaves behind an electric field that last 3 seconds, granting  bonus movement speed to Orianna and her allies when they step within. Enemies that step within would be  slowed for the same amount, decaying over 2 seconds after leaving the field.
